divs: Sighting DetailsAt @ 530 am CDT this morning 11262003 I was out on the back porch of my homelooking north when I noticed what appeared to be a bright star.I soon noticedthat the object was moving to the southsouth-east over Wichita Falls and as itbecame closer I could make out the shape of the craft being somewhat chevronshaped.There was no sound associated with this sighting.The air was calm.Thewhole craft was emitting a white light that illuminated the outline of itsstructure.As it approached closer I rushed inside to awaken my husband and whenwe returned it had flown into or above a formation of clouds approaching fromthe south. We watched for an additional 5 to 10 minutes and observed numerousbouncing lights white from within the edge of the cloud with a couple of flashesilluminating the cloud itself.Jean Marston
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Wichita Falls
There were no other sightings in Wichita Falls on or around November 26th 2003
Summary: Chevron Shaped Object Observed Over Wichita Falls,
